item.description:
Why not join us for a pleasant day of good conversation, a glass or two of terrific wine and  spectacular views of the New England foliage this Sunday.

We can begin at the Lazy Frog Restaurant in Morris CT http://lazy-frogs.com/contact.html for a bit of lunch.Then onto Litchfield- Haight Brown Vineyard  http://haightvineyards.com/ From there we head to Goshen - Miranda Vineyard (furthest from Haight)  http://www.mirandavineyard.com/ and our last visit to  Sunset Meadows (coming back toward Litchfield)  http://www.sunsetmeadowvineyards.com/ ***remember- most are 12-5:00 pm So come on out and enjoy the day. BTW...no beverages are allowed on winery premises. However, snacks are permissible. SEE YOU ALL THEN!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Terri or Rose. Terri's cell is 203-808-5829 if you need to call.

group.name: MIXING IT UP IN WEST HARTFORD AND BEYOND

item.name: A Day At The Wineries...Enjoy the Foliage With Us!!!
